Text: Typo in the end... the version is 10.589.22577 and not 10.5897.22577
And for gods sake you moroons, SHARE! I know of at least 10 people downloading this from me, that just after completed download, dissapeared....
Hey fellow... Why do we need a 8GB dvd when ISO weights only 3.8GB? .. is this ISO a compressed file?
why 8GB dvd if ISO is only 3.6GB? .. is this file a compressed ISO?
Thanks, will share at least 2:1. Instructions aren't completely clear: what filename should the .ALF file get, and where should it be placed? And what's the "BP" in point 4?
@Plutarco90 - The ISO is 6.7GB, but was RARd before uploading.
@longword - in crack_en.txt the 4th point in the install procedure says "4. Start the BP".
Thanks, zujapan. Any idea how to name the .ALF file and where to place it?

@zujapan: Thanks! I'll keep that in mind on the next release.. 

Rest: You can place the .ALF file wherever you want. You have to import the license file to the altium designer license manager. Do this under the menu DXP / My account / Add standalone License File, and select the license file you want to add.
Thanks a lot !!!! keep sharing guys :|
